mapper.sql: SELECT u.*, a.id AS account_id, a.user_id AS account_user_id, a.sn AS account_sn, a.domain AS account_domain, a.name AS account_name, a.type AS account_type, a.status AS account_status, a.created_at AS account_created_at, a.updated_at AS account_updated_at FROM itsnow_msc.users u LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.accounts a ON u.account_id = a.id

SELECT DISTINCT(con_a.sn) FROM itsnow_msc.contract_users con_cu LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.users con_u ON con_u.id = con_cu.msp_user_id LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.accounts con_a ON con_u.account_id = con_a.id WHERE con_cu.account_sn = #{accountSn}
mapper.select: WHERE UPPER(u.username) = UPPER(#{username}) AND ( UPPER(a.sn) = UPPER(#{accountSn}) OR a.sn = () )
